name: exVim
body:
## What’s New

* 2011-3-31: The new documentation of exVim are now available in exVim Wiki
* 2011-1-05: exVim Update to 8.05_b2
* 2010-5-26: exVim Update to 8.04
* 2010-5-26: ex-dev.com now available. exVim now is part of exDev.
* 2010-1-6: exVim source code move to github. It’s my birthday today .

## Links

* exVim Official Page: http://ex-dev.com/exvim
* exVim Documentation: http://exdev.webfactional.com/exvim/wiki/
* exVim Source Code: https://github.com/exdev/exvim
* exVim in Vim Script: http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=2627
* exVim in Google Code (for Download only): http://code.google.com/p/exvim

## Downloads

* [exVim 8.05_b2 Installer (Windows)](http://exvim.googlecode.com/files/exvim_installer-8.05_b2.exe)
* [exVim 8.05_b2 zip Package (Windows)](http://exvim.googlecode.com/files/full_package-win-8.05_b2.zip)
* [exVim 8.05_b2 zip Package (Unix)](http://exvim.googlecode.com/files/full_package-unix-8.05_b2.zip)

## Frequency Questions

**Q1: Where can I find the source code?**

A1: The exvim source code is running on [github](https://github.com/jwu/exvim).

**Q2: Where can I find the installer and zip package?**

A2: They are in the Download section in this site.

**Q3: Where can I find the documentation?**

A3: It is in the [exVim Wiki](http://ex-dev.com/exvim/wiki).

**Q4: Where can I submit an issue?**

A4: It is recommended to submit an issue in [github](https://github.com/jwu/exvim). For history reason, you still can submit the issue in [Google Code](http://code.google.com/p/exvim), I will manually add your issue back to github if it is acceptable.

**Q5: Where can I ask you a question about vim or exVim?**

A5: You can ask me questions through E-mail: [KarasAya@gmail.com](karasaya@gmail.com).
I’m generally very busy, I may not reply you immediately but I promise I will read all the mails and reply them as soon as possible.

**Q6: Do you have an official site?**

A6: Yes, exVim is part of [ex-dev](http://ex-dev.com/) project, and here is the exVim official page. This site also running the [exVim Wiki](http://ex-dev.com/exvim/wiki).

**Q7: Have you submit your project to Vim Scripts?**

A7: Yes, exVim also has a page in Vim Scripts, so that people can see the latest updates from the home page of Vim there. If you love this project, help me voting it there.

## Vote exVim if you love it

I do exVim in my spare time, if you love this project,
vote it in Vim Scripts in Vim’s official site here: [http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=2627](http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=2627)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
